pages.text: Ars Nouveau 1.22.3, Updated Bookwyrms!$(li)Bookwyrms must now be summoned by using a charm on a Lectern.$(li)Bookwyrms are now much more responsive and should not sit around as often.$(li)Bookwyrms can now work in a much larger area.$(li)Warp Scrolls now store head rotations.
$(li)Warp Portals now spawn players facing the direction the warp scroll was created.$(li)Warp Portals are now always black.
